statements: SELECT * FROM user_behavior_data;
SELECT user_id, device_id, behavior_type, timestamp FROM user_behavior_data;
SELECT user_id, behavior_type FROM user_behavior_data WHERE device_id = 12345;
SELECT user_id, timestamp FROM user_behavior_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS num_behaviors FROM user_behavior_data GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, behavior_type FROM user_behavior_data WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT * FROM user_behavior_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT behavior_type, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM user_behavior_data GROUP BY behavior_type
SELECT user_id, device_id FROM user_behavior_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-03-31'
SELECT DISTINCT device_id FROM user_behavior_data
SELECT * FROM UserBehaviorData WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, event_type FROM UserBehaviorData WHERE event_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT MAX(event_timestamp) AS latest_event_time FROM UserBehaviorData;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS event_count FROM UserBehaviorData GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM UserRecommendations ORDER BY recommendation_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserBehaviorData WHERE event_type = 'click' ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, event_type, event_timestamp FROM UserBehaviorData WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY event_timestamp ASC;

SELECT recommendation_id, user_id, recommendation_text, recommendation_timestamp FROM UserRecommendations WHERE recommendation_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY recommendation_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_events FROM UserBehaviorData GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_events DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT user_id, MAX(event_timestamp) AS latest_event FROM UserBehaviorData GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY latest_event DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 25;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT user_id, username, age FROM users ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE firmware_version IS NOT NULL;
SELECT activity_id, user_id, device_id, activity_type FROM user_activities WHERE activity_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email, age FROM users WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 AND gender = 'Female';

SELECT u.username, d.device_name, ua.activity_type FROM users u INNER JOIN devices d ON u.user_id = d.user_id INNER JOIN user_activities ua ON u.user_id = ua.user_id WHERE ua.activity_type = 'Login' ORDER BY ua.activity_timestamp DESC;

SELECT u.username, d.device_name, ua.activity_type FROM users u LEFT JOIN devices d ON u.user_id = d.user_id LEFT JOIN user_activities ua ON d.device_id = ua.device_id WHERE ua.activity_timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY d.device_name ASC, ua.activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_behavior_data;
SELECT user_id, behavior_type FROM user_behavior_data WHERE device_id = 12345;
SELECT device_name, location FROM device_info ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, preference_1, preference_2 FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT log_id, user_id, recommendation_id, timestamp FROM recommendation_logs WHERE user_id = 2002 ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT * FROM user_behavior_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, behavior_type, timestamp FROM user_behavior_data WHERE device_id = 12345;

SELECT u.user_id, d.device_name, r.recommendation_id FROM user_behavior_data u INNER JOIN device_info d ON u.device_id = d.device_id INNER JOIN recommendation_logs r ON u.user_id = r.user_id WHERE u.behavior_type = 'Click' AND d.location = 'Home';

SELECT u.user_id, u.behavior_type, d.device_name, p.preference_1 FROM user_behavior_data u LEFT JOIN device_info d ON u.device_id = d.device_id LEFT JOIN user_preferences p ON u.user_id = p.user_id WHERE u.timestamp >= NOW() - INTERVAL 1 WEEK;

SELECT u.user_id, u.behavior_type, r.recommendation_id, p.preference_1, p.preference_2, p.preference_3 FROM user_behavior_data u JOIN recommendation_logs r ON u.user_id = r.user_id JOIN user_preferences p ON u.user_id = p.user_id WHERE u.behavior_type = 'Purchase' AND r.timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM UserBehaviorData WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, device_id, action FROM UserBehaviorData WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-09-01' AND '2022-09-30' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT preference1, preference2 FROM UserPreferences WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT location, battery_level FROM DeviceData WHERE location = 'Living Room' AND battery_level > 50;
SELECT user_id, recommendation, recommendation_score FROM Recommendations WHERE recommendation_score > 0.8 ORDER BY recommendation_score DESC;
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM UserBehaviorData WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT device_id, location, battery_level FROM DeviceData ORDER BY last_update DESC;
SELECT user_id, preference1, preference2, preference3 FROM UserPreferences WHERE user_id IN (456, 789);
SELECT user_id, recommendation, recommendation_score FROM Recommendations WHERE recommendation_score > 0.8;
SELECT user_id, service_id, service_date, service_duration FROM ServicesHistory WHERE service_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
